title: Cucumber salad with lime and cilantro
directions: To remove some of the bitterness/spiciness from the onions, place the onion slices in a bowl, sprinkle about ½ tablespoon of salt over the onions. Rub the salt in and then cover with water for a few minutes. Then drain and rinse the onions well.
Place the sliced cucumbers, sliced onions, lime juice, chopped cilantro, and olive oil in a bowl.
Mix well, taste and add salt as needed.
Serve immediately or let rest refrigerated for at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 2 cucumbers, peeled or not – based on your preference, sliced
2 tablespoons of finely chopped cilantro (can also use parsley if you prefer)
